titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should submit a National Energy Policy Plan to Congress.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

bill.summary: 2/14/1995--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should submit a National Energy Policy Plan to the Congress by January 1, 1996, and biennially thereafter through 2006, together with proposals for implementing legislation that will provide for energy self-sufficiency for the U.S.
